description:
Sacacomie Lodge is one of my favorite. The hotel is beautiful, it has a rustic and cozy look and have an outstanding terrace facing the lake with a view that is totally fascinating. Have your favorite drink there, mine is a Ricard. 
The Sacacomie lake is awesome; surrounded by mountains and decorated with many islands, you will find peace-of-the-mind there as there are no motor boat on the lake. 
Canoeing on the lake is fabulous, you can have a picnic on many islands and there is event a nice flat rock to update you sun tan. See waypoint "RochePLATE".
directions:
You need to go at the Sacacomie Lodge located at N46.53242 W73.22153
Enter the hotel from the lobby and walk on the other side towards the lake and go outside. You will fins a set of stairs going down towards the lake and leading to the beach: N46.53535 W73.22257
If you are a guest of the hotel, you can take any canoe there for free !
title: Canoeing at lake Sacacomie
